```{r}
#| label: extract-figs-from-pickle-n-s-selected
figs =
  extract_figs_from_pickle(
    size.y = size.y,
    n_s = n_s_selected,
    dataset_name = dataset_name,
    output_folder = output_folder)

figs <- figs[subtype_order] |>   
  rlang::set_names(paste("Subtype", 1:n_s_selected))
```

::: {#suppfig-pvd_chosen_subtypes_bumpplot}

```{r}
figs |> 
  pvd_subtype_lineplot(
    events_to_highlight_groups = list(
      "orange" = c(
        "MRI: Cerebellar: Mild",
        "MRI: Cerebral: Moderate/Severe",
        "SCID: Anxiety Disorders: Threshold",
        "SCID: Mood Disorders: Threshold"
        ),
      "green" = c(
        "Parkinsonian Features",
        "Parkinsons"),
      "red" = paste("FXTAS Stage:", 1:5),
      "purple" = "SWM Between Errors: > 26"
    ),
    # highlight_color = "orange"
    highlight_color = "#FFF"
  )
```
